document_data.name: Emperel Ruousk
document_data.mainbody: '''Emperel Ruousk''' ({{Pronounce|emp|er|EL|refs=}}) was a member of the [[Purple Dragons]] and the guardian of the [[Lords Who Sleep]].
document_data.Activities: Emperel lived in [[Ashabenford]] but often was out in the [[Stonelands]] fighting alone against [[goblinoids]] and [[trolls]].
document_data.History: He was killed by the [[ghazneth]] [[Xanthon Cormaeril]] while investigating a series of murders in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Emperel was a polite man with a noble heart and calm reasoning. He was worried that goblinoid find on accident the tomb of the Lords Who Sleep.
document_data.Possessions: Emperel was equipped with a ''[[weathercloak]]'', a [[magic]]al [[dagger]], a magical [[ring]] that emitted light, and magical gauntlets that shot ''[[king's bolts]]''. Unfortunately, none of these items were of any use against the ghazneth.
